SELECT pr.id, pr.user_id, pr.money, pr.order_code, pr.create_date, ui.NAME AS userName, ui.phone, phi.name AS pharmacyName, phi.images, phi.address FROM payment_record pr LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = pr.user_id ) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( oi.code = pr.order_code ) LEFT JOIN pharmacy_info phi on (phi.id = oi.pharmacy_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND pr.order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{paymentRecord.orderCode},'%')
AND ui.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{paymentRecord.userName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{paymentRecord.userId}
ORDER BY pr.create_date DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(SUM(pr.money), 0) AS amount FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN payment_record pr ON ( DATE_FORMAT( pr.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' )) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
